description: The object `tabris.ui` is the root element for all widgets. This is the parent for all top-level pages, *actions* and the *drawer*.

background.description: Background color for the navigation elements

textColor.description: Text color for the navigation elements

toolbarVisible.description: Whether the toolbars above and below pages are visible.

displayMode.description: Allows to switch the UI to full screen.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page that is now active (visible).
